name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David WILLIAMS, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David WILLIAMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence vacated and record remanded for a new evidentiary hearing on degree of guilt.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael Turner, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
461 A.2d 197
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David WILLIAMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 27, 1983.
Decided May 10, 1983.
Reargument Denied July 8, 1983.
Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael Turner, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
